name: A Charlie Brown Christmas at DROM Taberna
description:
The Sullivan-Parker-Kettlewell Trio performs the beloved award-winning 1965 album soundtrack, A Charlie Brown Christmas. The Trio features piano, upright bass, and drums, along with a local children's choir to perform this best-selling jazz album, bringing the much-loved and cherished holiday music to children and adults everywhere across Ontario.

Join us this holiday season for this nostalgic performance, and enjoy hits such as Linus and Lucy and Christmas Time is Here. Children under the age of 12 are free.

Reservation proceeds will go directly to the musicians performing.

name: Sex Dalmatian's Hot Holiday Spectacular

location.name: Ada Slaight Hall at Daniels Spectrum

description:
A fierce n' festive spin off of Rock Bottom Movement's hit 2023 work, Sex Dalmatian. Choreographed by Alyssa Martin alongside a sparkling cast of company dancers from Compagnie de la Citadelle and Rock Bottom Movement, this epic holiday dance miracle will have you woofing your carols and slurping your nog.  
Ada Slaight Hall @ Daniels Spectrum

name: Good Neighbours Food Market
description: Community Market (formerly Good Food Markets) increases access to high-quality, culturally-relevant, and affordable produce in neighbourhoods where it is often unavailable. These are places where farmers' markets aren't viable because sales are too low to cover farmers' costs.

name: KUNE Global Jam live at DROM Taberna
description:
KUNE is a 4 to 12-piece collective made up of 10 immigrant musicians from all over the world and one Metis-Canadian. Our sound captures the experience of living in Toronto, the world's most diverse city. Through music, we remember where we came from and we envision a pluralistic future.

Join us as KUNE wraps up the year of musical programming with a collaborative jam event. They are inviting any and all local musicians to join them on the stage for a night of collective creation. Head to our website, or KUNE's website for more information on how to join the jam.

name: The Creation Series by 2PEONIES: Jenn Bae & Silent Scream with Annex Hotels
description:
Kick off our first-ever 'Creation Series' night with special guest Jenn Bae of Silent Scream at Annex Hotels. Come through for a Silent Scream preview, a live discussion on all things styling and starting a brand, alongside a lively night filled with music, culinary eats and Jenn's own cocktail menu. Plus, craft your own take-home arrangement at our luxury flora inspired by Jenn's approach to styling.

What's Included with General Admission:
Welcome drink
H'ors D'oeuvres
Complimentary flora bar
Jenn's cocktail bar
Fireside Chat
Live DJ

What's included with VIP:
All General Admission +
Reserved seating
Specialized appetizers
2 drinks from Jenn's cocktail bar
